pronunciation.pinyin: jì lái zhī , zé ān zhī
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

meanings.value: Since they have come, we should make them comfortable . Since we're here, take it easy.
Since this is so, we should accept it.
Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth.
If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.
